gamedi menma pasaledida mithuran boho wiya.owun nisa niwasin banum asu wara gananada ananthaya.manda yath karana tharamak kale waradi kriya nisaweni.pasu kalinawa kellan dedenekuda jiwithayata athulu wimath samaga methek kal gewu jiwana ratawe thawath pituwak peraluwak men hangina.namuth hithata ekangawa kisiwak sidu nowu nisath saba aadaraya therum ganimata nohaki wu nisath ee sabadathada binda watune nethata kandulakda ek karamini.ethan patan me wanathek jiwithaye aththe his thanaki.yantham wayasa wisi dekedi me samagen samugath ma adin patan ganna wasare patan gewenuye wisi nawaweni sathapum kanuwayi.pura sath wasarak demapiyangen ,nada hitha mithurangen wenwi gewu kalaya mata danenuye sira gathawimak lesataya.idin me wasarediwath nawatha me sama atharata yamata ita gaththe parakku wi ho mudal jiwithaya nowana bawa pasak wimata parakku wuna nisama nam nowe.
